summary: A documentary about the everyday lives of ordinary Parisians, done in the style of cinéma vérité.
cast: Angelo|Nadine Ballot|Catherine|Céline|Régis Debray|Henri|Jacques|Jean|Jean-Marc|Landry|Marceline Loridan Ivens|Madi|Edgar Morin|Marilù Parolini|Raymond|Jean Rouch|Jean-Pierre Sergent|Simone|Sophie
title: Crónica de un verano
